AUTHOR: Faxn
INSTALL_MSG: Watch out, some of these cogs are dangerous. Make sure you know what you are getting into before you `!cog install`.
NAME: Faxn's Cogs
SHORT: Several cogs by Faxn. Most notably 'rgr' a competent dice roller.
DESCRIPTION: The broken pieces of my old YesMan and dicebot bots, for easy ASSIMILATION by Red. 'archiver', 'markov' and 'rgr' are probably the ones you want.
